objectiveSeeds.name: Delve the Ancient Ruins
objectiveSeeds.description: Lost ruins hold treasure, knowledge, or power. The party must explore depths no one has survived.

stakes.on_success: Ancient secrets are claimed before they can destroy or corrupt.
stakes.on_failure: The ruins claim more lives, or what sleeps within awakens.

objectiveSeeds.name: Slay the Beast
objectiveSeeds.description: A monstrous creature terrorizes the land. The party must hunt it down and end its reign.

stakes.on_success: The beast is slain and its territory freed.
stakes.on_failure: The creature multiplies, migrates, or evolves into something worse.

objectiveSeeds.name: Break the Curse
objectiveSeeds.description: A supernatural affliction plagues the land or its people. The party must find and destroy its source.

stakes.on_success: The curse lifts and the afflicted are freed.
stakes.on_failure: The curse spreads and becomes permanent.

objectiveSeeds.name: Storm the Stronghold
objectiveSeeds.description: An enemy force has fortified a position. The party must assault it or infiltrate its defenses.

stakes.on_success: The stronghold falls and the enemy's power breaks.
stakes.on_failure: The fortress stands and the enemy grows bolder.

objectiveSeeds.name: Escape the Depths
objectiveSeeds.description: Trapped beneath the earth, the party must find a way out before they are consumed.

stakes.on_success: The party escapes with knowledge and scars.
stakes.on_failure: They are sealed below, lost to darkness and time.

objectiveSeeds.name: Recover the Lost Relic
objectiveSeeds.description: A powerful artifact lies in a dangerous place. The party must claim it before enemies do.

stakes.on_success: The relic is secured before it can be misused.
stakes.on_failure: The relic empowers an enemy or unleashes something ancient.

objectiveSeeds.name: Survive the Wilds
objectiveSeeds.description: The party must cross hostile wilderness where nature itself is the enemy.

stakes.on_success: They reach their destination changed but unbroken.
stakes.on_failure: The wilderness claims them, scatters them, or breaks them.

objectiveSeeds.name: Stop the Dark Rite
objectiveSeeds.description: Cultists prepare a ritual that will reshape reality. The party must reach them and stop it.

stakes.on_success: The ritual is disrupted and the cult broken.
stakes.on_failure: The world changes in a lasting, terrible way.

objectiveSeeds.name: Escort the Key
objectiveSeeds.description: Something vital must reach a destination despite pursuit through dangerous territory.

stakes.on_success: The key arrives and unlocks a way forward.
stakes.on_failure: The key is lost and hope dies with it.

objectiveSeeds.name: Cleanse the Corrupted Land
objectiveSeeds.description: Unnatural blight spreads across the earth. The party must find its heart and cut it out.

stakes.on_success: The corruption recedes and life returns.
stakes.on_failure: The blight becomes permanent and spreads beyond control.

objectiveSeeds.name: Defend the Settlement
objectiveSeeds.description: Monsters or raiders threaten a defenseless community. The party must hold the line.

stakes.on_success: The settlement survives and gratitude is earned.
stakes.on_failure: The community is destroyed, scattered, or enslaved.

objectiveSeeds.name: Break the Siege
objectiveSeeds.description: A stronghold or sanctuary is surrounded by enemies. The party must break through or end the assault.

stakes.on_success: The besieged endure and the enemy loses momentum.
stakes.on_failure: The defense collapses and all within are lost.

twistCandidates.name: The Villain Is a Puppet
twistCandidates.description: The enemy is controlled or summoned by something deeper and darker.

twistCandidates.name: Time Is Running Out
twistCandidates.description: The curse spreads, the ritual nears completion, or the beast awakens soon.

twistCandidates.name: An Ally Is Possessed
twistCandidates.description: A trusted companion is corrupted, cursed, or controlled at a critical moment.

twistCandidates.name: You Awoke Something Ancient
twistCandidates.description: Success triggers an older, deeper evil that was better left sleeping.

twistCandidates.name: The Monster Was Once Human
twistCandidates.description: The creature was transformed by curse or experiment and remembers.

twistCandidates.name: The Relic Is Cursed
twistCandidates.description: The sought object corrupts its bearer or attracts terrible attention.

twistCandidates.name: Rival Treasure Hunters
twistCandidates.description: Another band seeks the same prize and won't share.

twistCandidates.name: The Dungeon Is Alive
twistCandidates.description: Passages rearrange, rooms shift—the place itself is hostile and aware.

twistCandidates.name: Your Patron Sent You to Die
twistCandidates.description: The one who hired you knew what was down there and wanted you gone.

twistCandidates.name: The Spared Foe Returns
twistCandidates.description: A creature or enemy you showed mercy to comes back transformed or vengeful.

twistCandidates.name: The Guardian Was Protecting Us
twistCandidates.description: The monster guarding the way was keeping something worse sealed in.

twistCandidates.name: The Treasure Is Bait
twistCandidates.description: The hoard or relic was left as a lure to draw prey to a predator.

antagonistCandidates.name: The Blighted Archdruid
antagonistCandidates.goal: Transform the land into a twisted reflection of what was lost.

antagonistCandidates.name: The Serpent Cult
antagonistCandidates.goal: Summon their god through blood and ritual.

antagonistCandidates.name: The Ogre Warlord
antagonistCandidates.goal: Unite the tribes and crush the settlements that stole his lands.

antagonistCandidates.name: The Void Behemoth
antagonistCandidates.goal: Feed on reality and unravel the fabric of the world.

antagonistCandidates.name: The Lich-Scholar
antagonistCandidates.goal: Complete the research that death interrupted centuries ago.

antagonistCandidates.name: The Iron Warlord
antagonistCandidates.goal: Expand territory through conquest and enslave the defeated.

antagonistCandidates.name: The Devouring Mist
antagonistCandidates.goal: Spread and consume all life within its reach.

antagonistCandidates.name: The Possessed Guardian
antagonistCandidates.goal: Protect the ruins and destroy all who enter.

antagonistCandidates.name: The Necromancer Prince
antagonistCandidates.goal: Build an empire of the dead where he rules as immortal king.

antagonistCandidates.name: Rift Poachers
antagonistCandidates.goal: Plunder unstable sites and sell what should stay buried.

antagonistCandidates.name: The Last Warden
antagonistCandidates.goal: Prevent anyone from reaching the sealed chamber—at any cost.

antagonistCandidates.name: The Ashen Cabal
antagonistCandidates.goal: Control forbidden power through ritual sacrifice.

optionalConstraints.description: Combat should be rare and dangerous.
Actions have visible social and political repercussions.
Healing, rest, and supplies are scarce.
Final death reversal may be possible at great cost.
Preferred solutions emphasize restraint and non-lethal outcomes when possible.
Information is fragmented; investigation and inference are central.
The campaign is anchored in one primary location with deep exploration.
The environment itself is a persistent threat.
NPCs and factions conceal motives; trust is a resource.
